But in fact, they've found ways around it.Paimon Huh?{NICKNAME} I've heard of a group in the People of the Springs who call themselves wayfinders. 28a4bf0dac6b1a6b.voiceContent: #Paimon There seems to be a lot of eccentric artists in the Court of Fontaine. Apparently, they often stage artistic performances at the opera house, too.Paimon The people of Fontaine sure place a lot of importance on the arts. Guess that's why they call it the City of the Arts!Paimon It's nothing like Sumeru, where people had to do their performances in secret...{NICKNAME} You're pretty into the arts, huh?Paimon Of course! Paimon's pretty much a connoisseur.{NICKNAME} Okay, so what makes something art in your opinion?Paimon Well... Art should be something that's out of the ordinary. Something that sparkles like the stars at night!{NICKNAME} Hmm... By that definition, I have a work of art following me around wherever I go.Paimon ...Huh?Paimon Wait... You don't mean Paimon, do you?{NICKNAME} Yup! And now that I think about it, you should consider doing a performance some time. Paimon, live at the opera house... I bet a lot of people would go to see that.Paimon No way! Not gonna happen

2a1f923f3219f708.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} The Natlanese seem to have a genuinely close relationship with their saurians.Paimon Yeah! They're true companions, just like us. Inseparable wherever they go!{NICKNAME} So... let's say there was a competition between you and the saurians. Who do you think would win the title of champion companion?Paimon Huh? What sort of a question is that!?{NICKNAME} I mean, the more I think about it, it's like... You can't burrow into the ground like the tepetlisaurs, and you don't fly as fast as the qucusaurs...Paimon H—Hey! Y—You're thinking about this all wrong! For starters, Paimon flies way faster than any tepetlisaur, and she's better than the qucusaurs at, uh... at picking out the tastiest Chicken-Mushroom Skewer from the grill!{NICKNAME} And most importantly of all, Paimon has been at my side longer than any saurian.Paimon Exactly! Let's not forget who's the best travel guide in all of Teyvat, hehe!{NICKNAME} Alright, my trusty companion, shall we set off on our next adventure?Paimon Um, actually, now that Paimon's mentioned it, she feels like her Chicken-Mushroom-Skewer-picking-out skills have gotten a little rusty... C'mon, you should cook up a few so Paimon can practice

2af06ff44f2d46b8.voiceContent: #Paimon Arama, Arana, Araja, Arakavi... Whew, Aranara names are so hard to remember...Paimon The only bit Paimon's sure of is that they all start with Ara!{NICKNAME} Right, so if you were an Aranara, your name would be Arapaimon.Paimon Yup, and as for {NICKNAME}...Paimon Hmm, actually, they'd probably call you Nara {NICKNAME}...{NICKNAME} Yeah, we're all Nara to them...Paimon So if there was someone whose actual name was Nara, what would the Aranara call them?{NICKNAME} Nara Nara... I guess. Sounds kinda cute.Paimon Hehe, yeah

2dd2e6d2b0f6c46a.voiceContent: #Paimon Word is that speed's of the essence when doing archaeology work with the Children of Echoes. Why's that?{NICKNAME} It's probably because this place is absolutely overflowing with relics...Paimon Uh, but isn't that a good thing?{NICKNAME} Well, more relics means more competition! Imagine you saw a really cool stone slate one day, and planned to come back and grab it the day after — only to show up the next day and find someone else had already beaten you to it!Paimon Um, Paimon still doesn't get it...{NICKNAME} Okay, here's another analogy Imagine one night you're all ready to dig in to a delicious snack... but then you find a piece of it's missing!Paimon Ahh! Yeah, that'd be terrible!Paimon ...Wait a sec, that's exactly what happened last night... Anything you wanna confess, {NICKNAME}

2de6ddd7250c762d.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} It never stops raining on Yashiori Island. I heard it's because of the lingering evil energy.Paimon Evil energy? What's that? Sounds terrifying.{NICKNAME} It's caused by the remains of an evil god somewhere on the island. Because its power hasn't fully dispersed, the remaining energy causes all sorts of misfortunes. That's what I meant when I said evil energy.Paimon Oh, that makes sense. But Paimon doesn't think rain is a bad thing.Paimon Maybe that god has been crying all this time because they were bullied.{NICKNAME} Crying? I don't think gods can cry. I mean, I've never seen Venti or Zhongli cry before.Paimon There are exceptions! If you pinch Paimon, you'll be able to see a crying god.{NICKNAME} Hmm? Are you a god?Paimon Paimon sure is!{NICKNAME} Okay, let me guess... The flying god of silly questions? The god of slimes? Or the god of being fished out from the water?Paimon Paimon's none of those! Hmph!Paimon As your bodyguard, {NICKNAME}, Paimon is the god of protection! Hehe

2f8ef6a01b2b3d1d.voiceContent: #Paimon Paimon's heard that couplets are a traditional art form in Liyue. If you can write a line that works as a second half to one that someone else has written, you'll be well paid!Paimon But linking the couplet is hard, so it's not easy money.Paimon Not only does the rhythm need to match, but the meaning has to as well.{NICKNAME} Hmm... Care to give an example?Paimon Uh... Windrise's winds never churn.{NICKNAME} ...Um, But the Sea of Clouds' clouds always return.Paimon Huh... Not bad!Paimon Let's not waste time here. We've got some money to make

31dace5468f38898.voiceContent: #Paimon Apparently, every Melusine gets their own special token when they're born. They treat it as a symbol of their very being.{NICKNAME} If you were a Melusine, what would your token be?Paimon Definitely a fork! To represent Paimon's lifelong mission to taste all the delicious food in the whole world!{NICKNAME} Not Mora, then?Paimon Ooh, good point... Yeah, if it were Mora, it'd mean that Paimon's destined to be a super rich person. Then Paimon could buy anything she wants!Paimon Hmmmmm... Argh, Paimon's so torn! Both are so tempting...{NICKNAME} How about a fork made from Mora? Then you can have your cake and eat it, so to speak.Paimon Wow, that's a great idea!Paimon Anyway, enough about Paimon. Your token would probably be... a cooking pot, to represent being Paimon's personal gourmet chef!{NICKNAME} No no no, my token would be Paimon.Paimon Aw, really?{NICKNAME} With Paimon as my token, everything that you have would ultimately belong to me.Paimon Uh... Okay sure. Friends share everything, right?{NICKNAME} Haha, yeah... My stuff would still be mine...Paimon Hey, no fair

341295196bd5b4c8.voiceContent: #Paimon There always seems to be people throwing Mora into the fountain on Erinnyes.{NICKNAME} Yeah. Supposedly, the fountain fairies listen to people's wishes. That's probably how the custom began.Paimon Huh? So even fountain fairies need Mora?Paimon Whoa, they must be living the dream! All they need to do is find a fountain to live in, and they're all set! No need to work, just sit back and wait for people to literally throw Mora to you.{NICKNAME} I don't think that's quite how it works... You have to grant wishes, remember?Paimon Oh, okay, well... Oh young traveler, your wishes have been heard. Which lost sword is it that you seek? The Dull Blade, or the Silver Sword?{NICKNAME} They both look like trash, to be honest.Paimon Just choose one.{NICKNAME} Oh fair maiden of the fountain, neither of these swords is mine, and neither do I desire, for what I seek is my lost travel companion.Paimon Huh? You... You are a sneaky one, young traveler... Okay then, the fountain fairy shall grant your wish and become your best travel companion ever

34710310589f11b7.voiceContent: #Paimon How does a person become as rich... no, as super rich as Lady Ningguang?{NICKNAME} Hah... Is that the only impression she gives you? Riches?Paimon Well, there's the huge Jade Chamber, too! But isn't that also made of Mora?{NICKNAME} Well, you need an excellent mind...Paimon Well... Paimon's really good at giving people nicknames!{NICKNAME} You need to be very familiar with the workings of the markets...Paimon A serving of Fisherman's Toast goes for 1,025 Mora, and no discounts — even on rainy days.{NICKNAME} You also need to be willing to work really hard...Paimon Okay then... so, how do you make friends with a really rich person?{NICKNAME} Wait, you're giving up already!

363229ad01397f06.voiceContent: #Paimon Whew, Port Ormos definitely has a different vibe to Sumeru City...Paimon It's a bustling area, and there's so many outlanders. Plus, no one needs to spend all their time buried in their studies, which is nice.{NICKNAME} Yes, but that's why they end up being disciplined by the port authorities. So you see, Paimon? If you don't study hard, you'll end up just like them!Paimon Oh...Paimon Wait! What was that tone of voice for!

39197cc6b3ea2425.voiceContent: #Paimon Hmm...{NICKNAME} What are you mulling over, Paimon?Paimon {NICKNAME}, do you remember Gorou's fluffy ears?Paimon Paimon really wants something like that... Or maybe horns similar to the ones Ganyu has. Ganyu's horns are pretty cute as well.Paimon {NICKNAME}, do you have any ideas?{NICKNAME} Let me see, hmm... Oh, I found something!Paimon Really? Aw, {NICKNAME}, Paimon always knew you were reliable!{NICKNAME} Ta-da! I present to you the Tusk of Monoceros Caeli!Paimon Paimon doesn't need that!Paimon *sigh* If Paimon can't have Gorou's fluffy ears, then maybe at least something like his fluffy tail...{NICKNAME} Bubadada! Here you go — Tail of Boreas!Paimon ...Not that! Also, combining those two is definitely not the look Paimon is going for

3bbaf881ce87241b.voiceContent: #Paimon Has anyone left a big impression on you during our recent travels?Paimon For Paimon, that's Sara.{NICKNAME} Timmie.Paimon ...Huh? Why him?{NICKNAME} *sigh* His face comes to mind every time I've eaten a Sweet Madame recently... Really makes it hard to chow down

3bf4d1f75608b47a.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} Rumor has it that Jueyun Karst is the abode of the adepti.Paimon Wow — the abode of the adepti!{NICKNAME} Perhaps we'll meet the adepti on those cloud-piercing mountain peaks.Paimon Wow — meeting adepti!{NICKNAME} But I wonder... how would one normally communicate with the adepti?Paimon Wow — communicating with adepti!{NICKNAME} Hmm. My emergency rations seem to be going bad. *sigh* Best to consume them quickly...Paimon Ahem. Well... Paimon thinks that shouting from the mountaintop should work.{NICKNAME} That seems more like a way for getting the attention of a hilichurl instead of an adeptus

3dc782707c9af7e3.voiceContent: #Paimon Mondstadt has so many windmills, doesn't it?{NICKNAME} Well, the city is built above water, so it probably relies on windmills to draw the water upwards.Paimon That's correct! The winds blow through Mondstadt all year, so this supply of water is very stable.Paimon Also, the windmills are what they call visible winds — and wind chimes are called the audible winds.Paimon Paimon guesses they can be thought of as mascots and prayers to the Anemo Archon for protection.{NICKNAME} Ah, mascots. So, like you then, Paimon?Paimon No! Not at all! They're made of wood, and you can't eat them in an emergency either, 'cause all you'll do is grind your teeth down!{NICKNAME} Umm...{NICKNAME} ...I don't know what to say to that

4010443ae9b73f8d.voiceContent: #Paimon Here in Natlan, they seem to use woven scrolls where most nations would use books. It feels so different reading off of them.{NICKNAME} Yeah. They say it started with the Masters of the Night-Wind, when the Shamans began recording their tribal history and legends on woven material. As the practice became more widely adopted, the number and variety of stories grew.Paimon Ooh, Paimon should make a record of all our adventures as well! That way, if you ever start a tribe called the Travelers, you'll have your very own historical record!Paimon Plus, it could make a really cool cape. And an extra blanket when you're camping in the wild...{NICKNAME} That would make for one weathered chronicle

428b021ff05dcfdc.voiceContent: Is this... an answer from this world

42caf65d342fceac.voiceContent: #Paimon Paimon just thought of a great way to deal with Fontaine's prophesied crisis!{NICKNAME} Okay, let's hear it.Paimon You know those great big clockwork meka they use for digging tunnels? Well, why not send them deep underwater and get them to dig a load of drainage holes? Then no one'll have to worry about the water level rising anymore.{NICKNAME} Sounds logical enough, but where do you think the water will go?Paimon Ah, what does that matter! Think of it like... a coin pouch. When there's a hole in it, what's the use in racking your brains trying to figure out where all the Mora went? 'Cause the fact is, a coin pouch with a hole wouldn't be able to hold it all anyway.{NICKNAME} Well, I'd certainly like to know where all my Mora goes. But from what you're saying, it doesn't sound like you keep track...Paimon Hey, what's that supposed to mean? Paimon doesn't know where your... uh, P—Paimon doesn't know where your... Mora goes... hehe, heh..

47897216ea447cda.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} On the way back to Mondstadt after rescuing Dvalin...{NICKNAME} We finally got to see one of the Seven Archons, didn't we? It was interesting to see what kind of god he was.Paimon Hmm... Haven't we known Venti for quite a while now?{NICKNAME} As Venti, yes... But still, this was the first time that we got to see him as the Anemo Archon, Barbatos.{NICKNAME} Normally, he hides his true divinity behind the facade of a bard.{NICKNAME} What does freedom really mean, when demanded of you by a god?{NICKNAME} That was the question that he asked Dvalin... I'm still contemplating that... you know

4af8d0b8e45fea06.voiceContent: #Paimon You know what's strange? Clockwork meka are extremely intricate, and yet people regularly manage to fix them just by whacking them a few times. How does that work?{NICKNAME} I guess if a gear or drive shaft comes loose, sometimes whacking it or giving it a shake is enough to make the parts latch back on to each other.Paimon Huh? Paimon didn't follow that...{NICKNAME} Well, simply put, if the meka isn't actually broken, a little tap can nudge the parts back into the right places.{NICKNAME} But on the other hand, if one of the parts is damaged, then no amount of whacking is ever gonna fix it.Paimon Ohh! So it's like knocking sense into people. It works fine as long as they've got a brain, and they're just having a dumb moment. But if they're a total airhead, there's nowhere for the sense to go!Paimon ...Wait, why are you staring at Paimon's forehead?{NICKNAME} Don't worry, I'm not gonna whack you in the head. It wouldn't work anyway.Paimon Phew, well that's a relief— Wait... Hey

4df058af8c3b0e2a.voiceContent: #Paimon So it turns out they use the Pilgrimage to select the Pyro Archon!Paimon If Paimon was allowed to compete, maybe even she'd have a shot at becoming the Pyro Archon.{NICKNAME} Heh... That's the spirit, Paimon.Paimon Hey now, don't you underestimate Paimon! After all the gods we've come face-to-face with, you'd better believe Paimon's picked up a few of their signature moves!{NICKNAME} ...Like what?Paimon Like... A Buoyant Breeze, Slow-Cooked Bamboo Shoot Soup, Halvamazd, Pour la Justice...{NICKNAME} Ohh... you mean their signature dishes.Paimon Exactly! They should totally add a cook-off stage to the Pilgrimage! Once everything's settled down in Natlan, of course.Paimon Paimon can't wait to get a taste of the Pyro Archon's cooking

4e65fb890dd24299.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} Paimon, have you ever seen what Kaeya looks like under that eye patch?Paimon Nope.{NICKNAME} So, it would seem that he never takes it off...Paimon Actually, Paimon already knows why!{NICKNAME} Oh?Paimon He must be hiding some big secret!{NICKNAME} Really, a secret?Paimon See, Kaeya heads out for assignments more than anyone else.Paimon So the skin under that eye patch has to be way lighter than the rest of him.{NICKNAME} So if he ever takes that eye patch off...Paimon He'll definitely become the butt of everyone's jokes. Maybe he'll even get a weird nickname!Paimon Like, say, Pasty Eye!{NICKNAME} Guess he didn't need to take it off to get a weird nickname..

4edf160e657cc626.voiceContent: #Paimon So there's this place in Fontaine called the Fortress of Meropide. Was it named after someone called Meropide?{NICKNAME} I've never heard anything about that, but you could be right.Paimon Paimon's kinda envious. Having a building named after you must be an amazing feeling... When you have the time, can you build something in your Serenitea Pot and name it the Fortress of Paimon?{NICKNAME} Sure. In fact, I can do one better — I'll build it in downtown Fontaine.Paimon Really? But surely that'd be way too expensive. Are you sure you can afford it?{NICKNAME} Oh, absolutely. It won't actually cost that much.Paimon Wow, you're so generous! So, what're you gonna build...?{NICKNAME} I was thinking a cozy little clay... bungalow, with a wood-burner for under-floor heating, a waterbed... a few chopped onions, salt and pepper, some greens... and, um...Paimon Hey! Ugh, you are unbelievable! Can't we get through one nation without you cracking this stupid joke!

50ea76035d584ac2.voiceContent: There's still a long road ahead

519384de7df2ef84.voiceContent: #Paimon Do you think Yoimiya's dad's poor hearing is related to fireworks?Paimon He's been making and testing fireworks for many years now, and being exposed to the sound of gunpowder explosions on a daily basis... Paimon can see how that might've worn down his ears...Paimon Yikes! Since Yoimiya is inheriting her family business, does that mean she'll have trouble hearing other people in the future, just like her dad?Paimon Paimon won't let that happen! Let's think of some way to help her!{NICKNAME} Do you have any suggestions, Paimon?Paimon Uh... Um...Paimon Paimon could follow Yoimiya around and cover her ears whenever needed...{NICKNAME} Then you'd need to leave me.Paimon ...Without Paimon, you'd lose your guide. Paimon wouldn't leave you like that!Paimon But... What should we do for Yoimiya...{NICKNAME} Actually, she can simply wear earplugs while working with fireworks.Paimon Oh yeah! Paimon didn't think of that solution! You're so smart!{NICKNAME} Heh... That was the first thing that came to my mind, but I wanted to give you an opportunity for a mental workout.Paimon Eh? So you knew this whole time, but didn't tell Paimon?Paimon How could you! You bully

52b83edda2f16e31.voiceContent: #Paimon The Steambird's Great Detective Hurlock series is gonna be published by Yae Publishing House, right?{NICKNAME} Seems like it.Paimon But The Steambird clearly doesn't need help with printing and distribution. Why don't they just publish it themselves?{NICKNAME} Hehehe, you still have a lot to learn about the dark side of the publishing industry...Paimon Ugh, okay, you know-it-all! Go on then, give Paimon one good reason why The Steambird can't publish its own novels, when it already publishes a newspaper that's read all over Teyvat.{NICKNAME} Because the key to a successful light novel is...Paimon Uh-huh?{NICKNAME} The illustrations!Paimon What!? No way. Try telling that to all the writers and editors in Teyvat! They're the ones working their butts off coming up with ideas!{NICKNAME} Maybe so, but the Yae Publishing House has all the best illustrators on their payroll, and poaching them can't be easy. Artists like Calx must be virtually impossible to contact without going through them.Paimon Ohhh... Yeah, that's a fair point.{NICKNAME} Mm-hmm. But there's another reason, too...Paimon Hm?{NICKNAME} Only works published by the Yae Publishing House make it into Genius Invokation TCG crossovers!Paimon Huh, Paimon never knew!{NICKNAME} That's the deepest, darkest secret of the publishing industry It's not about stories anymore, it's about products and how to commercialize them.Paimon Hmph! That's just... sickening

5561eae452a3d7a3.voiceContent: #Paimon Fontaine's underwater world is so pretty! There's so many kinds of fish that Paimon's never seen before.{NICKNAME} If only we could swim underwater in other places too.Paimon Yeah, it's a real shame...Paimon If you could go diving anywhere you wanted, where would you choose?{NICKNAME} Hmm... Probably... either Liyue Harbor or Guyun Stone Forest.Paimon Ooh, great idea! There's gotta be some sunken ships around there full of treasure! We could make a fortune!{NICKNAME} Ooh, there's also Sangonomiya Shrine in Inazuma. The view underwater must be stunning around there. So, what about you, Paimon? Where would you go?Paimon Let Paimon think... Well, since you already chose places in Liyue and Inazuma, Paimon's gonna go for... Cider Lake!{NICKNAME} Not a bad choice. But you gotta be careful, because just when you're swimming along, minding your own business...Paimon Y—Yeah?{NICKNAME} Suddenly, you notice something slowly sinking in front of you...Paimon Huh!?{NICKNAME} It's round and chubby, with a red-and-white pattern on its surface. The moment you realize what it is, you know it's already too late...Paimon A Jumpy Dumpty!{NICKNAME} BOOM!Paimon Waaaaaah! And Paimon goes flying into the sky

557e9b84166c6be7.voiceContent: #Paimon Did you know there are hot springs in Inazuma?{NICKNAME} ...But there are no volcanoes.Paimon Umm, Paimon heard that the heat comes from a giant furnace!Paimon If we get the chance, Paimon also wants to check out a hot spring. Unfortunately, it seems like only the big shots are granted entry.{NICKNAME} Hmmm...{NICKNAME} Let's head back to the Dadaupa Gorge in Mondstadt!Paimon Eh? Why so sudden?{NICKNAME} Back in the Dadaupa Gorge, the hilichurls have a huge cauldron that's heated by Flaming Flowers. It should be similar to a hot spring, right? You can bathe in their... soup, I guess?Paimon ??

5603e6c879f00ef3.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} Liyue's cuisine is very different from that of Mondstadt.{NICKNAME} For example, in Mondstadt you can hardly find spicy fried dishes anywhere.Paimon That's why they say climate creates cuisine, ya know?Paimon But wait... Why do all of Teyvat's slimes taste the same, then?{NICKNAME} That's because you only know one way of cooking them..

58ef9c84f185cddf.voiceContent: #Paimon Hey, do that again! You know, that thing!{NICKNAME} Which one?Paimon The one where you make your weapon disappear with a swish, and then, fwoosh — you make it appear behind your back again!{NICKNAME} Oh, that. Haven't you seen that a ton already?Paimon But Paimon hasn't figured out how you do it yet. Could you explain it?{NICKNAME} Well, can you explain how you suddenly appear in front of me, and then disappear just as suddenly?Paimon Uh... well... Paimon seems to have always been able to do this. But Paimon doesn't know how...{NICKNAME} Precisely. I believe that the art of putting my weapon away follows the same principle.{NICKNAME} Maybe it's this similarity that makes us such good friends

598f90222858fe26.voiceContent: #Paimon Free knowledge without having to study at all? Canned Knowledge is amazing!Paimon Could Sumeru have Canned Knowledge about the different customs of the seven nations, too?Paimon If so, Paimon could just open a can every time we get to a new place. Paimon wouldn't have to explain things ever again!{NICKNAME} Or we could just open them all here in Sumeru.Paimon But... but traveling wouldn't be any fun without surprises to look forward to!{NICKNAME} Plus, if we opened them all here, I wouldn't even need Paimon as a guide anymore.Paimon Okay scrap that idea! No more Canned Knowledge. Let's save our Mora for something else!Paimon Something like... Oh! tipping Paimon for guide services! Heehee, seems fair, right

5c283e17de42f7e2.voiceContent: #Paimon Walk in seven clockwise circles, then walk in seven anticlockwise circles, then open your eyes...{NICKNAME} Are you... sleepwalking?Paimon Nope! Paimon is just trying to see if that antique shop from Heart's Desire actually exists!{NICKNAME} Well, assuming that a shop in a story does exist, what would you like to buy, Paimon?Paimon A Slime Creator!{NICKNAME} Does such a thing even exist

5cbd7c097cc3541f.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} Lately, some Guhua Clan disciples have been retelling an ancient story.Paimon The Guhua Clan, huh? Paimon bets it's a heroic story!{NICKNAME} Several female disciples decided to partake of a contest of arms to see who would marry their male junior, and he approved.Paimon Ooh, Paimon's heard this one. In Liyue, they call this a joust for a spouse!{NICKNAME} But the night before the contest, he stole the eldest disciple's favorite sword.Paimon Ah, so he wanted her to lose... Poor girl...{NICKNAME} I know, right? Forced to use a sword she wasn't used to, the eldest disciple suffered a crushing defeat.{NICKNAME} Unable to accept this result, she fell to her knees and wept.Paimon Oh no... She must have really loved him, right?{NICKNAME} In the end, she was forced to marry him in front of everyone. Hahaha.Paimon Wait... so the loser had to marry him!

5efb1aa2de53c7c7.voiceContent: #Paimon Oooh, there are so many cute Saurians in Natlan! Paimon's gonna make friends with every single one!{NICKNAME} Oh? Someone sounds confident...Paimon You bet! Paimon's got it all figured out!{NICKNAME} Oh you do, huh? Come on then, what's the secret to making Saurian friends?Paimon It's really simple! First, you've gotta sweet-talk them, show 'em you mean well so they relax their defenses. Then, you gently pat them on the head — that makes them feel more comfortable around you.Paimon Last but not least Get 'em some good grub! The way to a Saurian's heart is through the stomach, after all! What do you think? Solid plan, huh?{NICKNAME} Hmm, what do I think... I think that all of these tactics would also work really well on you, Paimon.Paimon Would not! Paimon can't be won over by some cheap tricks!{NICKNAME} Huh? Oh, you misunderstand! I meant to say that you're as cute as a baby Saurian!Paimon Hah! Flattery, really? You think that'll work on Paimon? Think again!{NICKNAME} But I was being sincere, Paimon! Ah, how can I prove it to you? With some Sweet Madame, perhaps?Paimon ...Wait, really? Sweet Madame? Oh, heck yes! Paimon could totally go for some of that right now!Paimon ...Uhh... What's with that smug look on your face? ...What!? Is Paimon missing something

64332af9532ff8ed.voiceContent: #Paimon So in Natlan, warriors who impress the Wayob enough get an Ancient Name. Paimon's so jealous! Having an Ancient Name would be so cool!{NICKNAME} Huh? Don't you already have a bucket load of titles, Paimon?Paimon Hmm? Oh wait... Yeah, you're right!Paimon Paimon's your best travel companion and trusty guide, plus she's the Trendy Flyer, Silver Companion, and Assistant to the Honorary Senior Researcher... Heck yeah, Paimon's an actual legend!Paimon If the people of Natlan end up making a record of our adventures, Paimon's gonna make sure they use every single one of those titles!{NICKNAME} Huh? But wouldn't that make everything too long?{NICKNAME} Just think about it. If the locals also used all of their names, records would look something like{NICKNAME} On this day, Uthabiti Kachina of the Children of Echoes, otherwise known as the Nanatzcayans, and Umoja Mualani of the People of the Springs, of Meztli fame, encountered Malipo Kinich of the Scions of the Canopy of Huitztlan, traveling alongside his impish partner, K'uhul Ajaw, while on their way to the Masters of the Night-Wind in Mictlan...Paimon Okay, okay, you can stop now! Geez, with a document that long, it'd stretch from here to the Stadium and back... and that's before it even got to the point!Paimon Well, if Paimon had to pick just one out of all her titles... Yep, it'd have to be Best companion ever

674f85f61b8f5ac8.voiceContent: #Paimon Only the ones who have the will to fight back are allowed into the Resistance!Paimon Huh. In that case, Paimon also qualifies as a member.{NICKNAME} And what exactly are you trying to resist, Paimon?Paimon Paimon has been resisting against the fate of being squished all this time!{NICKNAME} Then you probably won't get in.Paimon Why? Is it because Paimon isn't fighting for the same cause as the Resistance?{NICKNAME} It's because you're fighting for a lost cause, I'm afraid...Paimon *sob* Y—You meanie

6766570b216b9dde.voiceContent: #Paimon The Komore Teahouse is doing surprisingly well. They have a great number of visitors every day.Paimon We should also open a teahouse. Paimon feels that it'd be really profitable!{NICKNAME} Hmm... Well, if we do end up opening a teahouse, then you're gonna be the boss, for sure.Paimon Eh? Deal!Paimon Paimon didn't think that you'd have so much faith in Paimon's abilities... Paimon will make sure to be a responsible manager, and make our shop the best teahouse in Teyvat!{NICKNAME} Uhh, I don't think it'd need to be managed... Do you remember Taroumaru?Paimon Yup, he's the owner of the Komore Teahouse, right? A lot of the clients go to the Teahouse to play with him rather than drink tea.{NICKNAME} So I was thinking, if you were running the shop, you'd definitely be more popular than Taroumaru.Paimon Hee-hee, of course... Hey! So you don't really trust Paimon's management skills, you just want a mascot!

6818b123ebf44634.voiceContent: #Paimon It's time for Paimon's Little Life Tips!{NICKNAME} Little Life Tips?Paimon In Mondstadt, if there's something you can't fix, or there's something you can't get clean no matter what you do...Paimon If you ever run into something you can't handle yourself, you just need to shout this name into the skiesPaimon Noeeeelle!Paimon And everything that's troubling you will be swept away in an instant.{NICKNAME} So this is one of the tricks to living in Mondstadt... Pretty impressive..

69acc06881b84fc4.voiceContent: #Paimon Wow, a weasel thief's backpack can really hide a lot of Mora!{NICKNAME} Well, it's because weasels, by nature, enjoy collecting shiny objects.Paimon Paimon's heard that the origin of the weasel thieves has something to do with the Treasure Hoarders...Paimon Also, aren't crows the type to collect shinies as well?Paimon Paimon wonders if Oz has a secret stash of Mora that he collects behind Fischl's back.{NICKNAME} Well, now that you mention it, Paimon...{NICKNAME} I wonder, do you have—Paimon —Uhh... Nope. Nothing here! You won't find any Mora in Paimon's shoes, no way

711e82d14efc4964.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} Paimon, have you ever read Vera's Melancholy before?Paimon Well, it sure sounds familiar!{NICKNAME} That book's pretty popular, and I've heard that the author made a tidy sum off of it...Paimon *sigh* Paimon would love to make lots and lots of Mora...Paimon Hmm... It's decided, then! Paimon will write an adventure story as well!{NICKNAME} A tale of adventure, by Paimon?Paimon Correct! It'll be a story in which the brave traveler defeats the dragon, saves the world...Paimon And then sits down with her reliable companion for ten servings of Sticky Honey Roast!{NICKNAME} ...Ten!?Paimon Uh-huh! A happy ending attracts the readers, after all!Paimon It's decided, then! We'll call it Paimon's Happiness!{NICKNAME} Wait, what

76237e431886aabd.voiceContent: #Paimon Whoa, healthcare is FREE in Sumeru?{NICKNAME} Are you feeling unwell, Paimon?Paimon No, not right now. Thanks for asking, though.Paimon Hehe... Eating the street food on every corner has never sounded so tempting!{NICKNAME} Your stomach is gonna punish you for that!Paimon If so, Paimon'll go see a doctor and get treated — it's all for free! It'd be a waste not to take advantage of this, don't you think?{NICKNAME} Maybe... But then again, the treatment would likely include a restricted diet.Paimon *gasp* Oh no! So no more delicious food, then?{NICKNAME} That, plus the doctor would make you take the most bitter-tasting medicine ever.Paimon O—Okay... Maybe Paimon needs to reconsider this idea..

76bcefa40094114d.voiceContent: #Paimon At the Fontaine Research Institute, they research clockwork and different energy sources, right? So how come there are rumors about a mystery treasure?Paimon It'd make more sense if the treasure was owned by a bandit or a pirate.Paimon But Paimon's not sure that the researchers' and technicians' definition of treasure is really mysterious enough to get excited about...{NICKNAME} Hmm... What about researcher by day, bandit by night? Does that sound mysterious enough?Paimon Umm... Well for starters, it sounds exhausting. Imagine finishing your day job, then working a whole other job all night... When would they get time to rest?{NICKNAME} Maybe they wouldn't need to rest... If they were actually a clockwork meka in disguise!Paimon Ooh! A mystery treasure left by a clockwork meka who's a researcher by day and a bandit by night... Now that sounds more like it

7738014b353ae9fa.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} The Eclipse tribe... Huh. So the hilichurls have normal-sounding tribe names like these, too.Paimon The hilichurls of the Eclipse tribe are really mysterious.Paimon All the hilichurls of that tribe can draw an eclipse symbol.Paimon But rumor has it that only the Dada Samachurl of the Eclipse tribe knows why the eclipse symbol is so revered within their tribe.{NICKNAME} An eclipse symbol...Paimon Hmm? Did you say something, {NICKNAME}?{NICKNAME} Ah... I was... asking you what sort of soup you'd like to have tonight.Paimon Can't stop thinking about food, huh? Seems like you'd be more at home in the Meaty tribe than the Eclipse tribe. But anyway, Paimon wants boar soup. Thanks

77d5136c8fc70a13.voiceContent: #Paimon Paimon finds that hard work hardly works here in Mondstadt.{NICKNAME} Why do you say that?Paimon Just look at Huffman from the Knights of Favonius. He does his best at his duties every day...Paimon But the ever-relaxed Captain Kaeya is his boss.{NICKNAME} Hmm... But isn't Jean, who works the hardest, the Acting Grand Master?Paimon W—Well, how about this, then...Paimon Venti's the god of Mondstadt, and he's the laziest of them all

7a54c63afdabc482.voiceContent: #Paimon Come on, {NICKNAME}, Paimon'll teach you how to fly!Paimon Three, two, one!{NICKNAME} Ah, Paimon's gone.{NICKNAME} Well, whatever. *sigh* I'm tired. Let's just... sit here for a bit.{NICKNAME} *yawn* I'm flying with you... in my heart... Mm..

7d72c21a0c8e1c26.voiceContent: #Paimon You know who we haven't seen in a while? Xilonen. Last time we saw her, she was lying down in a tree fast asleep.{NICKNAME} And the time before that, she was sunbathing on the roof wearing sunglasses.Paimon And the time before that, she was chilling in her home-made rocking chair, sipping fruit juice...Paimon That's weird, how come our only memories of Xilonen are of her taking a break?{NICKNAME} Hmm... It could be that those memories only stand out because they're so unusual. Maybe she's such a hard worker that she doesn't take breaks very often.Paimon You think? Huh. Well, speaking of hard workers, Paimon's been finding herself in that category quite a lot recently.Paimon Like when we were chasing down that baby Tepetlisaur. Paimon had to fly up pretty darn high to show you the way.Paimon And also the time when we went Cacahuatl-picking, and helped that messenger from the Scions of the Canopy look for their package... Whew, if anything, Paimon's been working TOO hard.Paimon Hmph, Paimon's gonna be doing a lot more slacking off during our commissions from now on. But secretly, so you won't notice!{NICKNAME} You slack off all you need, Paimon. I'll make sure I don't notice.Paimon Aww, that's so nice of you! In that case... whenever you're slacking off, Paimon will make sure not to notice you, either!Paimon Although actually... It might be easier if we just slacked off together...Paimon Alright, new plan! We'll slack off at the same time, but without watching each other. C'mon, let's go, it's sunbathing time

7e06aa544d78c525.voiceContent: #Paimon You know what? When we first arrived at the Komore Teahouse, Paimon really thought that Taroumaru would be able to speak...{NICKNAME} You sound a bit disappointed.Paimon Of course! If Taroumaru could speak, Paimon feels that he'd say something really interesting!{NICKNAME} For example?Paimon Hmm... Thoma, stop hiding around here, you're in my way! *woof*{NICKNAME} That makes sense.Paimon Or... Kozue, you're bound to me for the rest of your life, unless our contract is terminated! *woof* *woof*{NICKNAME} You didn't believe Kozue when she said she'd signed a secret contract forcing her to work part-time at the Teahouse, did you?Paimon Oh! Paimon just thought of another one. This one's quite good—Paimon Just look at this visitor! Paimon, is it? Look at how cute and clever she is. Today, all her meals are on the house! *woof*{NICKNAME} There's no way Taroumaru would say something like that.Paimon Hee-hee..

7e665dd9e84491ac.voiceContent: #Paimon The People of the Springs are so chill. If they're not relaxing in a hot spring, they're planning their next big soak...{NICKNAME} Apparently, some of them even hire musicians to play some relaxing music while they take a dip. The warm water relaxes the body, and the soothing music relaxes the mind...Paimon Whoa, that sounds so nice, Paimon wants to try it for herself...{NICKNAME} Alright. Well, next time you visit the hot springs, I'll play some Aranara music for you.Paimon Ooh~ ...Um, but Paimon doesn't play any instruments, so what happens when it's your turn to go in the spring?{NICKNAME} You can sing me a song. Maybe... an opera from Fontaine?Paimon That's way too hard! Also — not exactly relaxing! That kind of music will put your blood pressure through the roof!Paimon How about some Natlan rap instead? Paimon's been practicing, check this outPaimon Hey! Flyin' in your face, it's Paimon the guide, no stranger to danger, takes it in her stride...Paimon Saw a beast called blubber in the nation of water, my Guhua brother got his weapons in order, sword in one hand and a spear in the other...{NICKNAME} Wow, very smooth!{NICKNAME} If I was listening to that in a hot spring, I'd be tapping the water to the beat like a drum.Paimon Yeah, it'd be like a big music festival! And anyone who's late to the party, the rhythm of the water would get them right into the groove!{NICKNAME} Uhhh... Wait, didn't we start this by saying how the hot springs are meant to be relaxing

7ed716258adcf5a9.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} Ah... Sure would be nice to spend a night at the Goth Grand Hotel...Paimon Paimon thinks so too!Paimon The rooms are sure to be big and clean.{NICKNAME} Still, I've heard Mr. Goth say that they've had all kinds of strange problems ever since the Fatui moved in.{NICKNAME} The Electro Cicins that their mages brought in attracted a lot of dust with static electricity, which ended up killing a lot of those Cicins.{NICKNAME} Then, someone mixed up the Mist Grass Pollen and the pepper...{NICKNAME} And the Agents ended up brawling amongst themselves, each insisting that the other owed them money for wine.Paimon ...Hang in there, Goth Grand Hotel..

823ae8792620fbaa.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} To think that the Geo Archon had signed a contract with the Cryo Archon.{NICKNAME} I wonder what the contents of their agreement were...Paimon Paimon doesn't care who you are, making a deal with the Tsaritsa is super dangerous!{NICKNAME} Be that as it may...{NICKNAME} Since Morax is the god who understands the basis of contracts the best...{NICKNAME} He's definitely given this some thought.Paimon Well that's true. Morax himself called it the contract to end all contracts...{NICKNAME} I trust that we will witness the truth, and its denouement, play out..

83be8b4bef5d8161.voiceContent: #Paimon {NICKNAME}, you know what a brush is, right?{NICKNAME} Of course! Kinda like pens but with animal hair at one end for calligraphy, right?Paimon That's correct! They say that finely-made brushes sell for high prices among Liyue's merchants!{NICKNAME} So, would you like to make some too?Paimon Uh-huh! But wild wolves are too fierce, so we should use Razor's fur to make brushes instead!Paimon Razor's fur is all downy and soft. It'll definitely make great wolf-fur brushes! We could make lots of Mora like this!{NICKNAME} Brushes made like that would conduct electricity. I'm not sure we could use them.{NICKNAME} Besides, Razor isn't a wolf, nor are wolf brushes made from actual wolves' fur...Paimon Huh? Why are they called wolf-fur brushes, then?{NICKNAME} Well, does Cider Lake look like it's full of cider to you?Paimon Hmm. You have a point

85f5b1e9031e7e4d.voiceContent: #Paimon Barbara's really popular, isn't she?{NICKNAME} Well, she is the idol of the people of Mondstadt.Paimon Come to think of it... Paimon doesn't really know what an idol is.{NICKNAME} It's an occupation in which one's work is to be cute, be well-loved, and earn a boat-load of Mora.Paimon Isn't that the same thing as being a mascot?{NICKNAME} That's... one way to put it

86074684f5c31750.voiceContent: #Paimon Sumpter Beasts are adorable! Paimon likes how the people who keep them give them each a special name based on their most distinctive traits!{NICKNAME} For all we know, the Sumpter Beasts might be giving each of us a name in return. Maybe that's how they respond when we call their name.Paimon Really? So what kind of name do think they'd give us?{NICKNAME} (Sumpter Beast noises)Paimon How is anyone supposed to understand that!{NICKNAME} A rough translation would be...{NICKNAME} Vociferous Pestiferous Melliculus Niveous Micro-Bipedal.{NICKNAME} That's the scientific name, of course.Paimon Oh? What would the common name be then?{NICKNAME} Noisy Two-Legged CritterPaimon Hey! Why keep only the negative traits

868936af1e756d43.voiceContent: #Paimon The clothes that shrine maidens wear are quite unique.{NICKNAME} I heard that after the Sakoku Decree is lifted, Yae Miko plans to run a rental service where people can try on shrine maiden outfits as a tourist attraction in various places. Combined with the latest Kamera technology from Fontaine, it seems like a real Mora maker.Paimon Oh!{NICKNAME} {M#The shrine maidens in the Grand Shrine even asked me if I knew any pretty girls who are willing to become models. All they need to do is to dress up in a shrine maiden outfit and smile to the Kamera. They even asked me to be a model and said all I needed was some makeup.}{F#The shrine maidens in the Grand Shrine even asked me if I was interested in becoming a model! All I need to do is wear a shrine maiden outfit and smile to the Kamera. They also asked me if I knew any other cute girls.}Paimon What!?{NICKNAME} I immediately shared this idea with Rosaria. I feel like they can do something similar at the Church of Favonius with the garments they wear.Paimon Wait, Paimon doesn't think that a...{NICKNAME} Sadly, Rosaria found the idea of it too troublesome.Paimon Maybe it's for the better..

887263d0c5e429d1.voiceContent: #Paimon For some reason, the Aranara's food all tasted a little too... um, how to put this... a little too fresh.Paimon It's totally different from what we usually eat.{NICKNAME} Yeah, but their ingredients are top-quality.Paimon Yeah, that's true. Still, those mushrooms and fruits were so raw, it felt like they were gonna keep growing in Paimon's stomach!{NICKNAME} Heh, you're exaggerating, right? You do have a point, though — maybe the best ingredients don't need a lot of fancy cooking.Paimon You're right. If the ingredients are good enough, they'll taste great even when cooked with the simplest methods.{NICKNAME} Just like Paimon. Just a little salt and pepper, and—Paimon Hey! For crying out loud, we're in Sumeru now! Don't you think that joke's getting a little old

88a53ae7d4b61278.voiceContent: #Paimon Wow, we've really had a lot of good food recently, haven't we?Paimon You know what they say Have food, will travel!{NICKNAME} Hmm... Won't you be unable to fly if you get fat?Paimon Nope! Paimon never gets fat!{NICKNAME} Huh...Paimon So Paimon demands more food!{NICKNAME} Ever eating but never growing... Don't you fail as emergency rations, then?Paimon Yeah, yeah... Well it sure doesn't look like you have any other candidates... So you'll have to make do with Paimon

89286405b3788e4c.voiceContent: #Paimon How did a genie that big get into Dori's lamp?{NICKNAME} There's only one way to find out In you go, Paimon.Paimon Not a chance! There's no way Paimon would fit in there!{NICKNAME} Okay, well... if you want, you can be the genie of the Serenitea Pot instead?Paimon Oooh, great idea! Paimon's down!{NICKNAME} You seem pretty excited about this...Paimon Uh, yeah! Paimon's been wanting to try this for ages! ...Poof! Didst thou summon me, O Traveler from a distant land?Paimon Come on, come on, now you have to grant Paimon three wishes! Paimon's first wish is... bring Paimon lots of delicious food!{NICKNAME} Paimon, you're not supposed to be the one making wishes

8cc2c68a8e75f8f6.voiceContent: #Paimon The Eremites are a real motley crew...{NICKNAME} There's certainly a diverse range of characters.Paimon Hmmm... yeah, that could explain it! Paimon can play lots of different characters too.Paimon Judgy Paimon, knowledgeable Paimon, helpful Paimon...{NICKNAME} ...And of course the classic, completely-misses-the-point Paimon

8e949c8c8a3461b1.voiceContent: #Paimon Inazuma's scenery is quite different than what we've seen so far.{NICKNAME} Yeah, Inazuma's an island nation.Paimon Before the invention of boats, how did the people living on different islands communicate with one another?{NICKNAME} According to Yoimiya's dad, they probably used smoke signals to transmit information.{NICKNAME} Or, they would...Paimon Yeah...?{NICKNAME} They would commission people who could freeze the water surface to travel between the islands and deliver messages.Paimon Whoa! If Kaeya had lived in Inazuma back then, he would've been even busier than Master Jean now

90a767ce99122448.voiceContent: #Paimon There's a saying of Rex Lapis' that's commonly used here in Liyue. Paimon thinks its rough meaning is... Don't play with your money.Paimon It's because the first Mora were minted from his golden form and given to humans in trust.{NICKNAME} Kaeya sure seems to enjoy playing with his money...Paimon And that's why you shouldn't learn from him.{NICKNAME} Well, as a child, I was taught not to play with my food.Paimon Yup, yup. You've got to respect your food.Paimon ...Wh—What are you looking at Paimon for

920ed0a1afaf65f4.voiceContent: #Paimon The residents of the Grand Bazaar are all so talented!Paimon They sell their own woven goods, beautiful vases and jars, and delicious-smelling spices that make Paimon's tummy start rumbling...Paimon And they all sing and dance really well! Paimon wishes she could do that.{NICKNAME} Well, if you're serious about it, there's no reason you couldn't learn.Paimon What? Really?{NICKNAME} Well for starters, you have a natural advantage when it comes to dancing.{NICKNAME} You won't trip over yourself, or accidentally step on someone's foot...Paimon Oh yeah! Paimon always forgets how useful flying can be!Paimon Alright then! Let's go bust a move at the Grand Bazaar and watch everyone shower Paimon with admiration!{NICKNAME} Aha, so that's what this is all about

92b737ab0de3e244.voiceContent: #Paimon Have you noticed the... makeup that Natlanese people wear? Or body paint, or tattoos, or graffiti, or whatever it's called — anyway, it looks really cool!{NICKNAME} I have noticed! Body paint is right, although it's not just any old paint. Apparently, it contains phlogiston.Paimon Wow, really?{NICKNAME} Yep. If you're interested to try it out, I'm pretty sure they offer a body painting experience specially for tourists — but they just use normal paint for that.Paimon Ooh! Well, since we're here... why don't we try it? All part of the experience.{NICKNAME} Sure thing. You'll need to pick a color palette and a motif first though. Each tribe has its own style.Paimon Alright, Paimon chooses, uh... Paimon chooses... Ugh! They all look so cool! Choosing between them is impossible.Paimon Meh, choosing is losing! Paimon will take them all!{NICKNAME} Wow... Today I learned that Paimon is a maximalist... Well, I'm sure some people would say less is more, but I say — you do you, Paimon!Paimon What are you talking about!? Paimon never said anything about using them all at once! She just wants options, so she can switch up her style every day!{NICKNAME} ...Oh. That's too bad... I woulda loved to see Paimon with an elaborate arm-tattoo...Paimon Stop! Nope! Stop it! No imagining Paimon with an arm-tattoo! Not allowed

943591b6e4bcd2d2.voiceContent: #Paimon You can see that Volcano no matter where you are in Natlan! Say, where do you think all that oozing magma comes from?{NICKNAME} Hmm, they do say that an ancient, massive Pyro Dragon slumbers in the deepest depths of Natlan, and that within this dragon dwells the world's first flame. That flame burns eternal in its body, causing it to develop blazing cavities on its back which periodically spew fire that takes the form of magma when it comes above ground.Paimon For real!? Then wouldn't Natlan be doomed if that Dragon was to ever wake up?{NICKNAME} Yep, and that's why the Pyro Archon has to gather the power of the tribes to regularly appease the dragon and ensure that it lies dreaming.Paimon： Wait, isn't the Abyss what the Pyro Archon is fighting against!?{NICKNAME}： Haha, I'm just recounting a legend on a woven scroll I bought the other day at a stall, that's all.Paimon： Paimon knew it

94e6759c0e97f083.voiceContent: #Paimon Paimon's heard that the earliest clockwork components ever invented actually work on a very simple principle!Paimon You take a long object made from a durable material, bend it, and wait for it to return to its original shape. As it rebounds, you can use the energy it gives off to power gears and stuff, and then you basically have an engine!{NICKNAME} Hmm... A long object made from a durable material... *gasp* You know what that reminds me of?{NICKNAME} Cryo and Pyro Regisvines! Don't you think?Paimon Eek! Of all the things you could've thought of, why those two?Paimon Huh, but come to think of it, the regisvines are pretty good at whipping their stalks around...{NICKNAME} And they're really strong too. If you let them charge up their energy and swing at you...{NICKNAME} They'll knock down anyone in their path. Even me — and we both know how strong I am!Paimon So are you saying that... you could turn the Regisvines into a clockwork mechanism?{NICKNAME} Well, think about it. Since Cryo and Pyro lifeforms are highly incompatible, if we put them both next to each other at a slight incline, so their necks are tilted towards one another...{NICKNAME} They'd spin non-stop to avoid touching each other!{NICKNAME} It would be the world's most powerful clockwork mechanism! Once we found a way to harness it, it would generate enough energy to power most of the machines in Fontaine!Paimon Ohhh! Yeah, you're right!Paimon This is a genius idea! Eat your heart out, Fontaine Research Institute!Paimon All we need to do now is find a way to bring the Regisvines to Fontaine, put them in position, and...Paimon Wait a sec... How the heck are we gonna get those overgrown ferns to Fontaine?{NICKNAME} As soon as we've tackled the minor issues of practicality and cost-effectiveness...{NICKNAME} ...How about we explore the details ahead of us later

9668c5b6020e9526.voiceContent: #Paimon Hmmm...{NICKNAME} Paimon, you look so serious today.Paimon That's because Paimon's thinking about serious things.Paimon Paimon's jealous of people from wealthy and influential families. They have an endless supply of Mora and mountains of delicious food to eat...{NICKNAME} I can't disagree. Those are exactly the things you're fond of.Paimon But after getting to know Ayaka better, Paimon realized that a young lady from a noble family can also have her share of hardships.Paimon She needs to shoulder her clan's duties and responsibilities. She works so hard and has very little time for herself.Paimon Ayaka must be exhausted, she should try to relax a bit...Paimon Ah, that's right! Let's invite Ayaka to the next festival!Paimon If she got an invite from us, there's no way she'd refuse.{NICKNAME} Yeah, I'd like to go to another festival with her.Paimon Besides, if Ayaka's around, she can pick up the tab for us...{NICKNAME} ...I should've seen that coming..

9bc1ed33c9b35422.voiceContent: #Paimon Fischl makes a very unique impression, doesn't she?{NICKNAME} How so?Paimon Well, she travels together with a talking raven, for starters.{NICKNAME} Well, I'm traveling with you. It's not all that different.{NICKNAME} Still, Oz can also translate for Fischl. You, on the other hand...Paimon What!? Paimon's way better than some bird!{NICKNAME} Haha, how so?Paimon Well, um... uh... at least Paimon doesn't need wings to fly

9c24d73edd45472d.voiceContent: #Paimon The whole of Sumeru City is built on top of a giant tree. How amazing is that!Paimon We've seen lots of incredible trees on our journey, haven't we? There's our old stomping ground at Windrise, the Frostbearing Tree on Dragonspine, and the Sacred Sakura in Inazuma!Paimon Sumeru's tree doesn't seem to have a fancy name though. People just call it the Divine Tree...{NICKNAME} Sometimes, the most important things have the simplest names.Paimon Really? Hmm, maybe you have a point. Long names would be kinda inconvenient if you had to say them every day.Paimon Anyway, people in the city only have to say down below and everyone knows they mean the bottom of the tree.Paimon What's that saying again? Names aren't things themselves, they're just words for things.{NICKNAME} So is Paimon just a word for a thing, too?Paimon Yeah. Well, uh, kinda. But... wait, no! No, Paimon is just Paimon

9cc40926fc2eb314.voiceContent: #Paimon Kamuileon... Cannon? Kamuijuicy... Cannon? Kamuijimmy... Cannon? Ugh... What a mouthful.{NICKNAME} What are you reading, Paimon?Paimon Look, it's the super weapon the Shogunate army has constructed nearby to protect Tatarasuna.Paimon  Kamuijima! Cannon!{NICKNAME} It looks really powerful... And yet, we didn't see it do anything while we were in Tatarasuna.Paimon It seems like the Resistance knew how strong it was, so before formally waging war against the Shogunate, they had covertly occupied this place.Paimon But this Kamui... Kamuijima Cannon needs either special ammunition or Electro to work, so it's no use to the Resistance.Paimon The Shogunate army put so much time and effort into creating this weapon... Paimon really wants to see the extent of its power.{NICKNAME} If all you need is an Electro user, perhaps I can help.Paimon That's right! Now we just need something that would serve as our cannon ball...Paimon Huh? ...Why are you giving me that look? Hey

9d0ee266e90daa94.voiceContent: #Paimon People in the city keep telling us how Palais Mermonia is a suuuper stressful place to work.Paimon But when we went to see it for ourselves, it seemed like hardly anyone works there, and the few people who do work there were hardly working.Paimon In fact, they looked like they didn't have a care in the world... What part of working there is supposed to be so stressful, exactly?{NICKNAME} Maybe the work they carry out is essential, but insignificant.Paimon How can something be both of those things at the same time?{NICKNAME} Well... Okay, so imagine that one day, you suddenly forgot how to fly and fell to the ground...Paimon That'll never happen. Flying's a piece of cake for Paimon.{NICKNAME} Probably not — but just in case, we should make sure that there's a cart loaded with cushions ready to catch you at all times.{NICKNAME} The cart would have to be designed to withstand any environment and weather conditions, and the cushions would need to be soft enough to break your fall gently...{NICKNAME} It would need to be built from the sturdiest timber and strongest rope, and packed with plenty of medical supplies and snacks...{NICKNAME} And all because keeping Paimon safe and sound is absolutely essential.Paimon You really mean that? Aw, thanks, hehe... But there's really no need to go to all that trouble.Paimon Paimon's been flying for a really long time. There's no way Paimon's gonna suddenly drop out of the air. So you don't need to worry about it.{NICKNAME} See? That's why it's insignificant.{NICKNAME} If it ever did happen, the consequences would be disastrous — hence why it's essential to be prepared.{NICKNAME} But practically speaking, the chances of it happening are next to nothing. So it's insignificant at the same time.{NICKNAME} If someone in the Palais Mermonia was assigned a task like that, it'd be up to them to decide how busy they wanna get. Chances are, they'd probably just sit back and do nothing.Paimon But... What if Paimon really does forget how to fly one day? What's gonna happen when Paimon falls to the ground?{NICKNAME} I'll be here to catch you, no matter what. Because you're not essential but insignificant — you're the best travel companion ever

9d8fa8a22cb693a0.voiceContent: #Paimon Strange...{NICKNAME} What's wrong?Paimon Diluc and Kaeya are really alike, so why don't they get along?{NICKNAME} How are they alike, again?Paimon Well, Kaeya's the kind of guy who acts shady in the light of day...Paimon While Diluc is a shining beacon of justice in the dark of night!Paimon Don't you think that's kinda the same thing...?{NICKNAME} Uhh... I still don't see it

9e66fb5a652f73af.voiceContent: #Paimon Port Ormos is built on the ruins of the fortress of The Alliance of the... the... the alliance of something, anyway.Paimon Ugh, the name's too long, Paimon can't remember it! Anyway, that's what all the bookish people in Sumeru say.{NICKNAME} Oh, you mean The Alliance of the Twenty-Nine Ocean Deys?{NICKNAME} Apparently, the alliance was formed by a bunch of arrogant pirate leaders, none of whom wanted to work for any of the others. They fought and looted each other constantly, causing endless chaos in coastal Sumeru...{NICKNAME} Finally, one day, they decided to enter into an alliance with one another and divide power equally between themselves. The members of the alliance were called Deys...Paimon Oh... And so after that... there was no more fighting and no more stealing, so everyone could get along happily and make a boatload of Mora together! Right?{NICKNAME} ...Paimon Right...?{NICKNAME} Well... presumably that's what they were hoping...Paimon Huh...?{NICKNAME} Before long, they were forming factions again, and the infighting between them escalated into the biggest internal battle they'd seen yet. Their fortress at Port Ormos was completely destroyed, and all the Deys were done for!Paimon Whaaat?{NICKNAME} Following that, an unprecedented period of peace finally came to Port Ormos, and the area began to develop into what we see today...Paimon Huh... So the Alliance was just a bunch of dumb bad guys..

9fde7cc1b5388775.voiceContent: #Paimon There once was a great knight who was cursed to spend the daylight hours looking like a shabby old drunkard.Paimon Only in the dead of night would he return to his true form a mature, brave, and self-respecting knight.{NICKNAME} Is there a way to lift the curse?Paimon Only if someone is willing to show genuine, heartfelt respect to the knight.{NICKNAME} Alright, I can do that. Let the curse be lifted!Paimon Ta-da! The curse has been lifted. Now, Grand Master Varka can choose for himself whether to be an old drunk or a respected knight.Paimon And then he said, I'm sorry, but I've been a shabby old drunk all along. So now he's a shabby old drunk both day and night.{NICKNAME} Wait, that's terrible!Paimon There's a different version of the story in Natlan that goes like this There once was a young girl cursed to become a snobby, stuck-up old lady during the day, only turning back into an innocent girl during the night.Paimon And, um... the only way to lift the curse was, uhh... having conversations about topics she liked.{NICKNAME} Well, I can already guess where this is going. If this was Madam Faruzan, then once the curse gets lifted, she'd probably say something like, Hmph, and what's wrong with being old? Do you have a problem with that, young lady?Paimon Right! And if it was Citlali...{NICKNAME} She'd get all anxious and pouty, and say, But... but I've been an innocent young girl all along...Paimon ...There's no actual curse in either of these stories, is there

a2081bd49ce24a13.voiceContent: #Paimon Oh yeah, have you drawn fortune slips at the shrine before, {NICKNAME}?Paimon If we draw them before our next adventure, they may provide us with some guidance.{NICKNAME} Hmm, but what if our draws are inauspicious or turn out to be a bad omen? If that happened, we'd probably end up in a bad mood...Paimon Oh, that's fine. According to the shrine maidens, if someone draws a bad omen, they just need to hang it on a tree in the shrine...Paimon So, we should keep on drawing and drawing, until we get a super lucky draw! Then, we'll hang all the bad ones on the tree!{NICKNAME} If everyone did that, there'd be no more space left to hang the slips..

a354ed873db3f465.voiceContent: #Paimon Come to think of it, while Rex Lapis enjoys visiting his people in private, he only descends officially once every year.Paimon None of the other gods do this. Hmm... Does Rex Lapis have any deeper intentions?{NICKNAME} I have my guesses...{NICKNAME} You see, those annual divine predictions have already captured the hearts of the people of Liyue too much.{NICKNAME} Round and around they analyze and scrutinize every single word, finding limitless hidden meanings within them...{NICKNAME} What do you think would happen to Liyue if such divine predictions were available every day?Paimon Ah!Paimon Paimon gets it now. Paimon would be offering Rex Lapis' favorite snacks to him every day!Paimon If you could just get Mora straight from Morax's hands, who would ever need to do a day of honest work?{NICKNAME} You made... some logical leaps, but that's basically how it is

a372a36d375b76c1.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} With the abolishment of the Vision Hunt Decree, I guess the Sakoku Decree will be the next one to go.Paimon Here's hoping that everything goes well.{NICKNAME} Let's encourage everyone to hold on for just a bit longer.Paimon Yeah!{NICKNAME} If we get the chance, let's find Atsuko and tell her that the sakura trees in her homeland are blooming.Paimon How is that supposed to comfort her!

a3fee283f358c376.voiceContent: #Paimon Mondstadt is full of wide plains and rolling hills.Paimon People say that when Barbatos made this land, he used the storm to flatten the cliffs and valleys...{NICKNAME} Still, it looks like he missed a few spots.Paimon Like Starsnatch Cliff?{NICKNAME} Exactly.{NICKNAME} On the map, it almost looks as if it was meant to be the apex of a vertical structure, but ended up at the wrong orientation.Paimon Wh—What's an apex

a4f8ec32e61a8d05.voiceContent: #Paimon Cyno's super into that card game Genius Invokation TCG, isn't he?Paimon Doesn't it seem kinda weird for the General Mahamatra to be into playing cards...?{NICKNAME} Well... not when you consider his hairstyle.Paimon Huh? What has his hairstyle got to do with it?{NICKNAME} You know, when you're playing a card game, the fancier your hairstyle, the more distracting it is for your opponent.{NICKNAME} What's going on with this guy? How did he manage to shape his hair like that?{NICKNAME} When your opponent's mind is consumed with thoughts like this, you'll quickly gain the upper hand.Paimon Hmm, really? Then we'd better think twice before playing against him...{NICKNAME} I don't know... I think I might just have an advantage over him.Paimon But you don't have a fancy hairstyle at all. And your clothes look pretty normal, too...{NICKNAME} But I do have Paimon.{NICKNAME} What's up with her? And what's that pesky flying companion of hers up to?{NICKNAME} As long as Paimon is floating by my side, Cyno's mind will be consumed with thoughts like this.{NICKNAME} I, on the other hand, would be completely unfazed by his hairstyle. So I'd be able to focus, and victory would be mine.Paimon Forget it! If you wanna play cards, go get a funny haircut

aa3267f9e198768b.voiceContent: This world is full of unsolved mysteries..

ac107d856cad46ee.voiceContent: #Paimon Guess what? Paimon just thought of the best Mora-making idea ever!{NICKNAME} Oh? Do tell.Paimon Just look at how many people pass by this place every day. If we opened a business here, right outside the Stadium, we'd make a fortune without even trying!{NICKNAME} So... What would you sell?Paimon Uhhh... maybe... alchemical potions from Mondstadt?{NICKNAME} I think there's already people selling similar stuff...Paimon In that case, ummm... Ooh! Ores from Liyue! Yeah, we could make a killing off of those!{NICKNAME} Pretty sure the Children of Echoes are already in that business, too...Paimon Yeah... Wait, Paimon's got it — rugs from Sumeru! Those'll definitely be a hit!{NICKNAME} Unfortunately, that's the specialty of the Masters of the Night-Wind.Paimon Well then... we'll fence the whole Stadium up! And charge an admission fee to everyone who tries to get inside, whether they're a contestant or a spectator!{NICKNAME} You'll be locked up before your fence is even half-finished...Paimon Grrrrrrrr! Why does getting rich have to be so hard

ac7c890ec40e93a0.voiceContent: #Paimon Fonta tastes amazing, don't you think?{NICKNAME} Yep. It's so refreshing, especially when you down the whole thing in one big gulp.Paimon Can you buy a glass for Paimon? Paimon's always wanted to try that thing.{NICKNAME} What thing?Paimon Just buy it, you'll see in a minute!Paimon Glug glug glug glug...Paimon Ahhhhh.Paimon That's what those drunkards do after they clink their glasses together. Paimon's been itching to try it for ages!{NICKNAME} Don't imitate them, Paimon... It's not a good look on you

ae6efd7208d56fc4.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} Teyvat's day and night both seem particularly short.{NICKNAME} The skies here are full of stars, but they aren't the same as the ones back home.{NICKNAME} I wonder if the fates of people from Teyvat are also related to their constellations.Paimon Oh? Do you know how to read the stars, too? That's amazing! Not a lot of people outside Sumeru can do it.Paimon Paimon's curious! Come on, do a reading for me, quick!{NICKNAME} Hmm...{NICKNAME} The night sky pictured on Paimon's cape... flows with the light of many stars, and also of the deep ocean...{NICKNAME} The movement of these stars... tells me that, uh... in, say, seven days from now...Paimon ...In seven days what?{NICKNAME} Something good, or something bad, might occur...Paimon Heh, right... your theory sounds as rock solid as a Geo Slime... And about as brainy, too

af37916ce4dab4a0.voiceContent: #Paimon Huh, novels in Fontaine have weirdly long names. This one's called Do Clockwork Meka Dream of Cogwheel Chiropractors?Paimon But the writing style and themes are pretty different from Inazuma's light novels.{NICKNAME} According to the synopsis, this novel is about a clockwork meka experiencing back pain due to bending over for extended periods. It finally gives in, quits its job as an illustrator, then goes on a long journey looking for a chiropractor to cure its mechanical spine...Paimon That actually sounds pretty interesting.{NICKNAME} But why a chiropractor, though? Wouldn't an engineer do the job better? They could just go to the Fontaine Research Institute, and save themselves the long journey.Paimon Well yeah, but... Having met some of the engineers from the institute, Paimon can see why they wouldn't want to...{NICKNAME} Oh yeah, that's true. But anyway, even though the protagonist of the story is a clockwork meka, you can still tell that it was written by a human. Imagine if they got a real clockwork meka to write a novel... I wonder what they'd write about?Paimon Hmm... How about this I Awoke One Morning and Found Myself Human!{NICKNAME} Hey, that's a good one, Paimon

b0aabde8c6d4628d.voiceContent: #Paimon Look into Paimon's eyes!{NICKNAME} Something the matter?Paimon Kaeya said that people's eyes will betray them.Paimon He can tell if someone is telling the truth or not just by looking into their eyes.{NICKNAME} Huh...Paimon Paimon loves Fisherman's Toast!{NICKNAME} That should be the truth. Haha, well, that's also because you love everything that can be eaten.Paimon Hehe.{NICKNAME} Speaking of looking into people's eyes... I remember one gaze that left a particularly deep impression on me.Paimon Whose gaze was that?{NICKNAME} A Ruin Guard's. Really made me want to poke its eye out..

b0b2c478da21f759.voiceContent: #Paimon Operas in Fontaine come in so many different genres. Historical, myths and legends, even fairytales and modern romances...{NICKNAME} And lots of adventure stories too.Paimon Oh yeah, like Tancrede et Chariclea! Oh Tancrede, you fool! If only you'd recognized Chariclea before it was too late...{NICKNAME} Apparently, the story's based on true events.Paimon Ooh... Does that mean that there'll be opera adaptations of our adventures one day?Paimon We've been through so many adventures together. There's gotta be a scriptwriter out there who's interested in taking our story to the stage!Paimon And they won't have to worry about crafting the perfect tragedy, either. Everyone loves a happy ending, right?{NICKNAME} Ooh, how about we get a head start and assign voices to ourselves?Paimon Hmm... Paimon thinks you have a mezzo-soprano voice. What do you think Paimon should be?{NICKNAME} Remind me — what's that shrill voice that most prima donnas have?Paimon Oh, you must be thinking of coloratura soprano— Hey

b31ac1672d24adc6.voiceContent: #Paimon Paimon's heard that in Liyue, people call the crane the gentleman bird.{NICKNAME} And do you know why that is?Paimon Hmm... Paimon's not quite sure...{NICKNAME} Well then, let me tell you about the story of the lucky crane repaying its debts.{NICKNAME} A long, long time ago, there was a kind-hearted scholar who saved a lucky crane that had fallen into a trap.{NICKNAME} Later, on a cold winter's night, a beautiful maiden came to his door, asking to lodge with him.{NICKNAME} The maiden shouldered a greatsword on her back, and taught all that she knew of swordsmanship to the scholar, supervising him as he studied day and night.Paimon Whoa...{NICKNAME} Once he had finished his training, he went out into the wilds with the maiden to do good and fight for justice.{NICKNAME} Ten years later, the lucky crane took the form of a gentleman, and finally came to return the favor, but discovered the couple had already lived out a fortuitous life...{NICKNAME} And that's the story known as The Gentleman's 10-Year Debt.Paimon Ahh..

b5cb5eff145d254d.voiceContent: #Paimon So many people in Sumeru want to become scholars.Paimon Motivated by this ambition, they all study really hard to try and achieve it...Paimon But Paimon bets that the first ever scholar didn't set out to become a scholar...Paimon Hmm... so what do you think the first ever scholar's ambition was?{NICKNAME} Probably... to get their research paper written as quickly as possible.Paimon Huh? But isn't a scholar's ultimate goal supposed to be pursuing the highest and greatest knowledge or something?Paimon Paimon's sure that it must have been because of a fervent desire for knowledge that they became Sumeru's first true scholar.{NICKNAME} Writing papers is how you pursue knowledge.Paimon But what about when it's the highest and greatest knowledge of all...{NICKNAME} Even then, if you wanted to prove it, you'd need a research paper.{NICKNAME} And after that, you'd need to start working on another paper to validate your original thesis...Paimon O—Okay, Paimon's got it! Come on, don't look so sad! It's not like you have to worry about writing papers yourself!Paimon ...Y—You've never had to write a paper before, right...

b9950f17d182f1f0.voiceContent: #Paimon Did anyone tell you that there are monsters called tanuki in Inazuma that can take on the form of any human they see?{NICKNAME} I heard such rumors before. They must know some mysterious transformation techniques.Paimon What if one day a tanuki tricked you by transforming into Paimon? Oh no... Paimon's worried now! {NICKNAME} No worries, I'd surely be able to tell the difference— Wait! You're just concerned about my Mora, aren't you?Paimon Of course... Ah! ...No, no! Paimon's only concerned about your safety, {NICKNAME}!Paimon Hmph, stop looking at Paimon like that. *pouting* Look, just think about it! If there were two Paimons, how would you find out which one is the real one?{NICKNAME} ...Eh-he.Paimon What do you mean eh-he!?{NICKNAME} See, only the real Paimon would respond like that.Paimon Ah! Paimon got tricked again..

bb3c2c902e159ed8.voiceContent: #Paimon It's hard to talk about the recent events in Inazuma and not mention the Vision Hunt Decree.Paimon But you don't have a Vision, so you don't have to worry about losing one.Paimon On the flip side, if you are caught by the Tenryou Commission, {NICKNAME}, you also can't surrender your Vision in exchange for your life...{NICKNAME} I can tell them that you are my Vision.Paimon Another reason to have Paimon around... Wait, WHAT!?{NICKNAME} Don't worry, I wouldn't let them take you, Paimon.Paimon That's more like it.{NICKNAME} We'd just go to jail and suffer punishment together...Paimon Uh... W—Well, if that's how it would go down, then maybe you should hand me over to them...Paimon ...Wait a minute! How about we just don't get caught in the first place

bb74ee035c2d80b3.voiceContent: #Paimon Don't you think those masked warriors look super cool?{NICKNAME} Yeah, really gives them an air of mystery.Paimon Right!? Don't you think Paimon should get in on this too? Put on a mask and win some wrestling matches with the Collective of Plenty? She could make a whole new name for herself!Paimon Paimon's even thought of some catchphrases, get this A saurian warrior never removes her mask!Paimon Famous adventurer by day, mighty saurian warrior by night. Does that sound cool or what!?{NICKNAME} Yeah, it does, but there's just one problem...Paimon Hmm? What's that?{NICKNAME} You'll just look like Paimon in a mask. No air of mystery there

bbb4f1490397f589.voiceContent: #Paimon Cider Lake never freezes, no matter what time of year it is.Paimon The best apple ciders in Mondstadt can only be made using the fresh water from this lake.Paimon It really does taste great! Paimon could drink two big bottles in a second!{NICKNAME} Wow.Paimon Tee-hee!{NICKNAME} With your size, I can't believe that you can drink that much liquid...{NICKNAME} ...And not explode like an Anemo Slime.Paimon Paimon has a special stomach just for tasty drinks!{NICKNAME} Huh... I guess the world really is a big place. So many things to consider..

be1796fea71d4d0c.voiceContent: #Paimon Those Onikabuto bugs look so scary! The patterns on their backs are terrifying!{NICKNAME} Do you mean those demonic patterns? It's because they don't like to fight, so they purposely evolved their patterns in a way that scares their enemies away.Paimon That's really smart. We should try to learn a thing or two from them!Paimon We could borrow Xiao's mask. If a hilichurl saw you wearing it, do you think they'd run in fear?{NICKNAME} Uh... I don't think Xiao would agree to that...Paimon Yeah... Hmm, how about we ask Sayu to steal his mask for us?Paimon She knows ninjutsu that allows her to vanish into thin air. She can steal it for sure! Problem solved!Paimon Uh... If we are afraid of Xiao evening the score with us, how about we steal Childe's mask? We've kicked his butt many times before!{NICKNAME} I don't think stealing other people's belongings is a good idea. Also, what if Sayu doesn't agree to all of this?Paimon Th—Then let's... Let's visit Albedo first.Paimon If Albedo can develop a growth serum for Sayu, she'll help us for sure!{NICKNAME} Brilliant, now we just need you to come up with a way to make Albedo help us.Paimon Ugh! Paimon's head is going to explode. Let's stick to festival masks for now

be7019b9e06b65e0.voiceContent: #Paimon Paimon thought we'd be saying goodbye to the amazing cafés after we left Sumeru. But it seems like people in Fontaine are big coffee drinkers too!{NICKNAME} They sure are. Even the newspapers run articles about how great coffee is at keeping you awake and alert. And at boosting your energy levels, so you can keep performing at peak efficiency during a long working day.Paimon Whew, any job where you need coffee to stay energized must be exhausting...Paimon Like, umm... Blacksmiths? Maybe chefs too... And adventurers — they're always running around all over the place. Hey, and what about divers?{NICKNAME} Divers, huh? That's definitely the odd one out here...{NICKNAME} How are divers supposed to drink coffee when they work underwater the entire time?Paimon Yeah, that's a good question!Paimon They can't take off their helmets underwater, so they'd probably have to shut themselves inside an even bigger glass box and drain all the water out before they could finally drink their coffee. Probably from a bottle...Paimon No, wait... If the coffee's already in a bottle, all they'd need is a long straw that goes from the bottle into their helmet. Then they'd be able to take a sip of coffee whenever they want!{NICKNAME} Hehe, eww, haha. But then the coffee would go cold!{NICKNAME} Cold coffee is just gross. With the important exception of iced coffee, but that's its own thing.Paimon Well that's no problem. They can just bring a stove with them underwater.Paimon You've seen the kind of stove that most people use in Fontaine, right? It only has one small opening up at the top. As long as that's sealed nice and tight, it won't go out even underwater!Paimon Wait a second... No way, is that... That's it! That must be the whole reason stoves in Fontaine are made that way!{NICKNAME} Ding ding ding, right answer! That is indeed the reason behind the design of the Fontaine-style stove.Paimon Hehe, Paimon's the smartest!Paimon Hey, how about we open an underwater café? Paimon bets there's lots of divers out there craving some coffee while they're down in the depths... Yeah, this could be a huge opportunity for us!Paimon Once we open the world's first-ever underwater café, the Mora will come rolling in! Heck, and why stop at cafés? The ocean's our oyster! We could build a whole shopping mall down there! Then a whole underwater business district...Paimon Hee-hee! Ah, it's gotta be the best feeling in the world, making Mora through your very own stroke of business genius!{NICKNAME} Just one thing, okay? ...Don't go taking out a loan in my name

bec08f552c71aaf6.voiceContent: Maybe I wasn't meant for this world..

bee49a388be4c362.voiceContent: #Paimon Ugh, Paimon's so bored... So tired...{NICKNAME} Well, since we're bored either way, wanna imitate the other Knights for fun?Paimon Huh? Isn't that a bit disrespectful?{NICKNAME} Haha, I see you already have the knightly virtue of modesty and politeness. Very impressive.Paimon Hey! Paimon sees what you're doing. Cut it out

c1ba93ff34e36987.voiceContent: #{NICKNAME} Pro tip. While we're in Fontaine, if someone ever picks a fight with you, you should never fight back unless there are witnesses around.Paimon Huh?
